user.title: Serac - Location
user.description: Enter a name for your location and its GPS coordinates to get weather forecasts.

data_description.location_name: A name for this location (e.g., 'Chamonix Mont-Blanc')

prefix.title: Entity ID Prefix
prefix.description:
Choose a short identifier for your entities. Suggested: {suggested_prefix}

Example: {example_entity}

data_description.entity_prefix: Lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only. Must start with a letter.

massifs.title: Avalanche Data (Optional)
massifs.description: Optionally add Météo-France BRA API token and select massifs for avalanche bulletins. You can skip this step if you only want weather data.

data_description.bra_token: Météo-France API key for avalanche bulletins
data_description.massif_ids: Select one or more massifs for avalanche risk data

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to weather API. Please check your coordinates and try again.
error.location_not_supported: This location is not covered. This integration works for locations in France and Andorra.
error.invalid_prefix: Invalid prefix. Must start with a letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores (1-20 characters).
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

init.title: Serac Configuration
init.description: Change your massif selection or BRA API token. The integration will reload automatically to apply changes.

data_description.bra_token: Météo-France API key for avalanche bulletins. Leave empty to remove avalanche data.
data_description.massif_ids: Select one or more massifs for avalanche risk data. Deselect all to remove avalanche sensors.
